pairing_initializing_instr: Make sure your headset is connected or your wireless adapters are plugged in and turned on.
pairing_nofreedongles_desc: It looks like your controllers are already connected!
pairing_nofreedongles_instr: To pair a new controller, turn off one of your existing controllers.
pairing_nodongles_desc: SteamVR is unable to find any hardware to pair controllers to.
pairing_nodongles_instr: Make sure your headset is connected.
pairingdevice_a_logitechvrinkpiloteditio: a Logitech VR Ink Pilot Edition
pairinginstructions_generic_desc: Place your controller into pairing mode
pairing_knuckles_instructions_press: Press and hold both the %1$s and %2$s until the light on the controller begins blinking blue...
pairing_pen_instructions_press: Press and hold both the %1$s and %2$s until the light on the pen begins blinking blue...
pairing_tracker_instructions_press: Press and hold the %1$s until the light on the tracker begins blinking blue...
pairing_button_differentcontroller: I want to pair a different type of controller...
